subject: Loading a DLL
msgSnippet: Hi, I m trying to write some tests of a WebLogic application, and the classes I m testing require the MsWrapper DLL to be loaded, but I can t seem to get it
messageBody:
Hi,
I'm trying to write some tests of a WebLogic application, and the
classes I'm testing require the MsWrapper DLL to be loaded, but I
can't seem to get it work. I've tried adding:
System.loadLibrary("MsWrapper");
But the test fails at run-time complaining that MsWrapper is not on
the Java library path. I've also tried setting the Java library path:
String initialPath = System.getProperty("java.library.path");
System.setProperty(
"java.library.path", "C:\\programs\\bea81\\weblogic81
\\server\\bin;" + initialPath);
But this doesn't seem to make any difference. Any suggestions
appreciated. Thanks. AA.
